sentences.sContent: To calculate the field, an assumption of displacement charge is introduced.
sentences.sContent_eng: To calculate the field, an assumption of displacement charge is introduced.
sentences.sCn: 为计算这一径向电场，引入了位移电荷的假定。

sentences.sContent: Consider now the same test carried out with servo control based on crosshead travel or displacement of the grips .
sentences.sContent_eng: Consider now the same test carried out with servo control based on crosshead travel or displacement of the grips .
sentences.sCn: 现在我们来研究用十字夹头位移或位移夹头伺服控制来完成相同的试验。

sentences.sContent: A disturbance traveling through a medium by which energy is transferred from one particle of the medium to another without causing any permanent displacement of the medium itself.
sentences.sContent_eng: A disturbance traveling through a medium by which energy is transferred from one particle of the medium to another without causing any permanent displacement of the medium itself.
sentences.sCn: 波，振动：穿过介质的振动，通过振动使能量从介质的一个粒子传送到另一个粒子而并不导致介质本身的永久变位。

synos.tran: [化学]取代，[心理]移位；[船][航][机]排水量

phrases.pCn: 横向位移，侧向位移；侧方移位
驱替效率；置换效率；洗油效率
排水量曲线；排量曲线；驱替特征曲线

words.tran: 取代；置换；转移；把…免职；排水
